mapper.select: SELECT * FROM QNA ORDER BY NUM DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA (NUM, TITLE, CONTENTS, WRITER, REGDATE, HIT, REF, STEP, DEPTH) VALUES (QNA_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{contents}, #{writer}, SYSDATE, 0, 0, 0, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE QNA SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENTS = #{contents}, REGDATE = SYSDATE WHERE NUM = #{num}
